Name: Vampiric Revelry
Story Background: In the darkest hours of the night, vampires gather to revel in the shadows, feeding on the fear of the living.
Ability: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
Appearance Description: The card depicts a group of vampires feasting on a hapless victim in a moonlit graveyard, surrounded by eerie mist and flickering torches.
